title: Riverside Plaza 1-Bedroom Apartment with great views
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom - 1 bath / 575 sq ft / $934-$1,125/month / Includes utilities', 'Riverside Plaza', 'Leasing Office: 1525 South 4th Street, Suite 201, Minneapolis, MN  55454', 'Rental office walk-in hours: 1 to 5:30 pm Monday-Friday', 'Call today to schedule a private tour of Riverside Plaza:', 'show contact info', "During the pandemic, we are taking the necessary steps to protect your and the residents' health and safety.", 'All participants, including the tour guide, are required to wear masks and provide hand sanitizer.', ' Riverside Plaza features distinctive layouts, large windows that offer breathtaking views of downtown, and up-to-date appliances in our spacious kitchens.', 'We value our residents and their time so we offer 24-hour emergency maintenance and numerous amenities on-site, including a management team, convenience store, and more.', 'Riverside Plaza is within walking distance from:', '-\tDowntown Minneapolis', '-\tMississippi River Historical & Recreational areas', '-\tCurry Park and Brian Coyle Community Center', '-\tUniversity of MN and Augsburg University', '-\tMany restaurants, shopping, and entertainment venues', '-\tThe Lightrail Green & Blue lines as well as several bus lines', 'Call us today and schedule an appointment!', 'Apartment Features', 'Utilities Included', 'Tenant Controlled Central Air & Heating', 'Ramp and Elevator Access', 'Cable/Satellite Available', 'Downtown & River Views', 'Floor to Ceiling Windows', 'Large Closets', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Property Amenities', 'On-Site Convenience Store', 'Controlled Access', '24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Fire Sprinkler System', 'Computer Lab', 'Security Cameras', 'On-site Management', 'Night Patrol', 'Underground Parking', 'Courtyards', 'Multilingual Staff', '2 Playgrounds', 'On-site Laundry', 'Elevators', 'Flexible Lease terms', 'Rental Income Limits Apply to Some Homes:', '*Limits subject to change annually, call for details.', '1 Person \t$43,440', '2 Person \t$49,680', '3 Person \t$55,860', '4 Person \t$62,040', '5 Person  \t$67,020', '6 Person  \t$72,000', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
